text: Does anyone know the best way to make HubSpot Landing pages compliant with CCPA, GDPR and GPC. Can we remove the the tracking code pixel from the page? If so, how could we execute this….Or is there an alternative to remaining compliant w/o removing the pixel?
You can pick and choose what you send to Facebook and all the other tracker type services
And you have control over the data bexause it sits on you server so when a customer request for removal you can trigger some process of removal
And it’s the only way you can truly promise your users you know exactly what’s going on with their data
Thanks <@U04GE91SXQA>. Is this something I could find on knowledge base? And I was presuming I code go into the landing page html and make adjustments there. Sorry i’m lite-code/nocoder, but learning
It’s not specific to HubSpot it’s more of a google tag manager thing . There are some other services that you can use too but I’m familiar with tag manager
